channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: German FA slaps down proposal to boycott World Cup as Trump rebuke: ‘debates on sports policy should be conducted internally and not in public’
item.description: Oke Göttlich, who is also the president of Bundesliga club St. Pauli, referred to Trump's recent actions and and said it was time to consider a boycot...

item.title: This is How Hard It Will Be to Get Around Italy’s Winter Olympics
item.description: The Games in northern Italy, which start on Friday, will be spread across 8,500 square miles. Long distances, narrow roads, complex connections and sn...

item.title: Polls Show Strong G.O.P. Support for Trump on Immigration
item.description: A small, but growing, share of Republicans say that enforcement has gone too far, after the killing of two Minneapolis protesters.

item.title: Son of Norway’s Crown Princess Goes on Trial Over Charges Including Rape
item.description: The trial of Marius Borg Hoiby, who has also been accused of assault and other crimes, began as his mother came under pressure over her ties to Jeffre...

item.title: Famed startup incubator Y Combinator to let founders receive funds in stablecoins
item.description: The move is significant since, in the past, generally just crypto VC firms have let startups receive funding in the form of digital assets.

item.title: One of the most generous welfare states in the world is no match for the ‘motherhood penalty’
item.description: Subsidized child care is available for all children from 6 months old in Denmark, and parents pay no more than 25.%. Pay for women still goes down.

item.title: Kairos, which is building a cross-platform tool for prediction markets traders, raises $2.5 million from a16z crypto
item.description: The startup’s platform will display bets from Kalshi and Polymarket.

item.title: Palestinians Return to Gaza for First Time in Nearly Two Years
item.description: Only 12 returnees reunited with families. Some said their arrival carried larger weight, defying any notion of permanently displacing Gazans.

item.title: A Role Model for How to Die
item.description: What if you really did live every day as if it were your last? That was Brian’s plan.

item.title: Oracle billionaire Larry Ellison’s next big bet: Redefining how long–and how well–we live
item.description: As people live longer and birth rates fall, longevity is becoming a major challenge–and opportunity–for business and society alike.

item.title: Trump and India Call Off Their Trade War, but the Terms of Peace Are Murky
item.description: Officials and business leaders welcomed lower tariffs, but India has not yet confirmed that it would stop buying Russian oil, which President Trump sa...
